statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 52600. If she receives a raise of 2800 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-52600 = 47400. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{47400}}{{2800}}={16.928571428571} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 17 years.
